about_the_game:
Medimon - Where Health Meets Play!
Health class meets monster taming! Ever thought biology was a snooze fest? Think again! Dive into the world of Medimon and discover that health science is not just about textbooks and diagrams. It's about epic battles, wild captures, and raising your own team of monsters!



The Premise:
Your Medimon aren't just cool creatures to show off; they're a lesson in health science! Whether it's a cell breaking bones (literally!) or an organ system squirting acid, each Medimon has a story. And guess what? You're the star student here!



Game Features:

• Catch & Learn: Capture a Medimon and you're not just adding to your collection; you're getting a fun-sized lesson in health sciences!

• Battle & Evolve: Think you've seen it all? Wait till you see a white blood cell transform into a formidable immune warrior. Talk about an upgrade!

• Journey Through: With 7 game locations to explore and 184 monsters to catch, you're in for a health science roller-coaster. Buckle up!

• Quests: Who said learning can't be fun? Embark on quests to solve health science mysteries. It's like a pop quiz, but with monsters... or Medimon!

The Backstory:
Medimon started as a dream in the classroom of Dr. Tyler Bland. With a sprinkle of passion, a touch of genius, and a whole lot of fun, it's now a game-changer (pun intended!) in health science education. Big shoutout to the University of Idaho WWAMI Medical Program for believing in this vision!

Join the Adventure:
Whether you're a gamer looking for the next big thing in monster taming or a budding health professional trying to make sense of the circulatory system, Medimon is for you. Do you need to know anything about the health sciences? No, but watch out, you may learn something even if you aren't trying to. Get ready to play, learn, and laugh. Because here, health is the real endgame!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Celeron G530 2.4Ghz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650M or similar
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100T 3.2Ghz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or similar
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: "Medimon" is a health science-themed monster-taming RPG. Players capture, battle, and evolve creatures symbolizing health concepts, turning intricate biology into an interactive and captivating game experience. Dive in and make education an adventure!
